item.title: about
item.description: I’m a hacker and entrepreneur. I have been generalizing complex problems and developing various frameworks and middleware to solve them. I can not only develop cutting edge technologies, but also use these technologies to develop products that solve real world problems. Professional experience Datachain(2018-): Co-founder, CTO, Blockchain engineer Lead research and development in blockchain interoperability Design and development in PoC with partner companies See the project details “Media” section.
